text: The Cook () is a 1965 Soviet comedy film directed by Edmond Keosayan.В эти выходные в летнем кинотеатре покажут любимые комедииНа Украинском бульваре покажут «Стряпуху»Сделано с любовью — встречено с ненавистью == Plot == A beautiful cook girl comes to one Kuban collective farm and she immediately attracted the attention of many men who began to look after her. But only one of them she reciprocated.Стряпуха == Cast == * Svetlana Svetlichnaya as Pavlina Khutornaya * Lyudmila Khityaeva * Inna Churikova as Varvara * Konstantin Sorokin * Georgiy Yumatov * Ivan Savkin * Lyudmila Marchenko * Vladimir Vysotsky * Zoya Fyodorova * Sergey Filippov * Valeriy NosikСтряпуха (1966) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet comedy films Category:Soviet films
title: The Cook (film)
